alert.note: Alert for Carver (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Carver County through 1015 PM CDT... At 951 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norwood Young America and Hamburg moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waconia and Cologne around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Carver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and east central Minnesota.
